data.title: Everything You Need To Know
data.meta_description: 24. The Lake House (2006) The Lake House is a fantasy romance between a solitary doctor and a grief-stricken architect. The architect resides in a strange lakeside house and exchanges love letters with its former resident, the doctor. At the earliest, the two must disclose the mystery behind their romance, or the worse is to […]
data.text:
24. The Lake House (2006)

The Lake House is a fantasy romance between a solitary doctor and a grief-stricken architect. The architect resides in a strange lakeside house and exchanges love letters with its former resident, the doctor. At the earliest, the two must disclose the mystery behind their romance, or the worse is to happen.

Director: Alejandro Agresti

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

Main Cast:

Keanu Reeves

Sandra Bullock

Christopher Plummer

Ebon Moss-Bachrach

IMDB Rating: 6.8

Box Office: $114,830,111

Run Time: 1 hour 39 minutes

Movie Trailer: The Lake House (2006) – Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Lake-House-Keanu-Reeves/dp/B0091X27J4/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1TF8JIM8B7CUQ&keywords=The+Lake+House+%282006%29&qid=1659334019&s=instant-video&sprefix=the+lake+house+2006+%2Cinstant-video%2C342&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

25. She’s the Man (2006)

Viola’s twin brother Sebastian moves to London to work on his musical piece. Meanwhile, Viola disguises herself as Sebastian, heads to his boarding school, and fulfills her dream of being a part of the soccer team. However, unconsciously she falls in love with his/her roommate Duke who sets his eyes on Olivia. Soon, Viola learns she’s not the only one caught in the romantic web.

Director: Andy Fickman

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Sport

Main Cast:

Amanda Bynes

Laura Ramsay

Channing Tatum

Vinnie Jones

IMDB Rating: 6.3

Box Office: $57,194,667

Run Time: 1 hour 43 minutes

Movie Trailer: She’s the Man (2006)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Shes-Man-Amanda-Bynes/dp/B015O3MPZA/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3LCBODCMOWTQJ&keywords=She%E2%80%99s+the+Man+%282006%29&qid=1659334527&s=instant-video&sprefix=she+s+the+man+2006+%2Cinstant-video%2C848&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

26. Just My Luck (2006)

Ashley Albright is considered a lucky charm in the agency where she works. At a masquerade party, she meets Jake, an unlucky aspiring Manager. Destiny plays when she kisses him and later realizes that she swapped her fortune with his bad luck.

Director: Donald Petrie

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

Main Cast:

Lindsay Lohan

Chris Pine

Samaire Armstrong

Bree Turner

IMDB Rating: 5.4

Box Office: $38,159,905

Run Time: 1 hour 43 minutes

Movie Trailer: Just My Luck (2006)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Just-My-Luck-Lindsay-Lohan/dp/B000JJH5WS/ref=sr_1_1?crid=39E2JOUQ5EU1&keywords=Just+My+Luck+%282006%29&qid=1659334760&s=instant-video&sprefix=just+my+luck+2006+%2Cinstant-video%2C344&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

27. Pride & Prejudice (2005)

Butterflies flutter when lively Elizabeth Bennet encounters the wealthy, proud, and unmarried Mr. Darcy. With time and events, Mr. Darcy also realizes that he has fallen in love with Ms. Elizabeth Bennet, a lady beneath his class. Still, how will the pair overcome their pride and prejudice and unite?

Director: Joe Wright

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama

Main Cast:

Keira Knightley

Matthew Macfadyen

Brenda Blethyn

Donald Sutherland

IMDB Rating: 7.8

Box Office: $121,616,555

Run Time: 2 hours 9 minutes

Movie Trailer: Pride & Prejudice (2005)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Pride-Prejudice-Keira-Knightley/dp/B000I9YLUI/ref=sr_1_1?crid=17AW8IZZC2KER&keywords=Pride+%26+Prejudice+%282005%29&qid=1659334892&s=instant-video&sprefix=pride+%26+prejudice+2005+%2Cinstant-video%2C336&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

28. Just Like Heaven (2005)

A desolate landscape artist is drawn by an attractive woman’s spirit and nature, who used to live in his new apartment. He starts loving her, looking at her ethereal form, and things are not the same as before.

Director: Mark Waters

Language: English, Spanish, Mandarin

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy

Main Cast:

Reese Witherspoon

Mark Ruffalo

Donal Logue

Dina Spybey-Waters

IMDB Rating: 6.7

Box Office: $102,854,431

Run Time: 1 hour 35 minutes

Movie Trailer: Just Like Heaven

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Just-Like-Heaven-Reese-Witherspoon/dp/B015O0V6V2/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3QOOBJY0LYF6D&keywords=Just+Like+Heaven+%282005%29&qid=1659334977&s=instant-video&sprefix=just+like+heaven+2005+%2Cinstant-video%2C682&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

29. The Notebook (2004)

Sparks fly between a destitute yet vibrant young man and a wealthy young lady. Love gives her freedom, but their societal differences keep them apart.

Director: Nick Cassavetes

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama

Main Cast:

Gena Rowlands

James Garner

Rachel McAdams

Ryan Gosling

IMDB Rating: 7.8

Box Office: $118,230,644

Run Time: 2 hours 3 minutes

Movie Trailer: The Notebook (2004)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Notebook-Ryan-Gosling/dp/B000YMFCS4/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1V4O1HYZ18B0E&keywords=The+Notebook+%282004%29&qid=1659335217&s=instant-video&sprefix=the+notebook+2004+%2Cinstant-video%2C340&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

30. Before Sunset (2004)

Jesse is on tour to promote his best-selling novel, which centers around his chance encounter with Celine, whom he met nine years earlier. He spots her in the crowd during his book tour in Paris, and they exchange their philosophies on love and life. Will this 1-hour encounter change their lives?

Director: Richard Linklater

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama

Main Cast:

Ethan Hawke

Julie Delpy

Vernon Dobtcheff

Louise Lemoine Torrès

IMDB Rating: 8.1

Box Office: $15,849,759

Run Time: 1 hour 20 minutes

Movie Trailer: Before Sunset (2004)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Before-Sunset-Ethan-Hawke/dp/B001N9BGGY/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3OAFZW81L540M&keywords=Before+Sunset+%282004%29&qid=1659336213&s=instant-video&sprefix=before+sunset+2004+%2Cinstant-video%2C866&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

31. A Cinderella Story (2004)

Yet another version of the fairy tale, this movie narrates the story of poor Samantha Montgomery, who is exploited every day by her stepmother. However, the modern-day Cinderella is thrilled to meet her Internet boyfriend at the school’s Halloween party.

Director: Mark Rosman

Language: English, German, Czech

Genre: Romance, Family, Comedy

Main Cast:

Hilary Duff

Chad Michael Murray

Jennifer Coolidge

Dan Byrd

IMDB Rating: 5.9

Box Office: $70,067,909

Run Time: 1 hour 35 minutes

Movie Trailer: A Cinderella Story (2004)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Cinderella-Story-Hilary-Duff/dp/B003I7EYFY/ref=sr_1_1?crid=2CAZIHCA300NQ&keywords=A+Cinderella+Story+%282004%29&qid=1659336323&s=instant-video&sprefix=before+sunset+2004+%2Cinstant-video%2C1905&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

32. 13 Going on 30 (2004)

After disastrous events on her thirteenth birthday, Jenna wants to evade her life until she turns thirty. So she makes a wish on her birthday, and the next day, to her surprise, she wakes up as she wished. Still, will she find her best friend Matt in his thirties, whom she thought to have destroyed her birthday party?

Director: Gary Winick

Language: English, Portuguese

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

Main Cast:

Jennifer Garner

Mark Ruffalo

Judy Greer

Andy Serkis

IMDB Rating: 6.2

Box Office: $96,455,697

Run Time: 1 hour 38 minutes

Movie Trailer: 13 Going on 30 (2004)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/13-Going-30-Jennifer-Garner/dp/B09VQ4H2K6/ref=sr_1_1?crid=5AXA631VQWNT&keywords=13+Going+on+30+%282004%29&qid=1659336469&s=instant-video&sprefix=13+going+on+30+2004+%2Cinstant-video%2C319&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

33. 50 First Dates (2004)

Henry Roth fears committing to anything until he meets the gorgeous Lucy. Then, believing he has found his dream girl, he gets along with her. But, sadly, the next day, Lucy forgets him as she suffers from short-term memory loss. Will Roth create a lasting impact in Lucy’s mind?

Director: Peter Segal

Language: English, Hawaiian, Mandarin

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Sam Andler

Drew Barrymore

Rob Schneider

Sean Astin

IMDB Rating: 6.8

Box Office: $198, 520, 934

Run Time: 1 hour

Movie Trailer: 50 First Dates (2004)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/50-First-Dates-Adam-Sandler/dp/B00RNUL1SK/ref=sr_1_2?crid=3QJQK2IKT77VX&keywords=50+First+Dates+%282004%29&qid=1659336673&s=instant-video&sprefix=50+first+dates+2004+%2Cinstant-video%2C326&sr=1-2″ watchon=”Amazon”]

34. The Girl Next Door (2004)

A teen’s desires take shape when a former porn actress moves next to his apartment, and they get entangled in the love web.

Director: Luke Greenfield

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Emily Hirsch

Nicholas Downs

Elisha Cuthbert

Timothy Olyphant

IMDB Rating: 6.7

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Girl-Next-Door-Emile-Hirsch/dp/B001F62C86/ref=sr_1_1?crid=21Z7NTB8NBB3E&keywords=The+Girl+Next+Door+%282004%29&qid=1659336797&s=instant-video&sprefix=the+girl+next+door+2004+%2Cinstant-video%2C323&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

35. How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)

Benjamin Barry is an ad executive and a favorite of women. So he takes the call to win an extensive campaign by making a lady love him in ten days. Will his efforts yield fruits?

Director: Donald Petrie

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy

Main Cast:

Kate Hudson

Matthew McConaughey

Adam Goldberg

Kathryn Hahn

IMDB Rating: 6.4

Box Office: $177,502,387

Run Time: 1 hour 56 minutes

Movie Trailer: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/How-Lose-Guy-10-Days/dp/B000JGH1H0/ref=sr_1_1?crid=2HART5KT2U65J&keywords=How+to+Lose+a+Guy+in+10+Days+%282003%29&qid=1659336950&s=instant-video&sprefix=how+to+lose+a+guy+in+10+days+2003+%2Cinstant-video%2C326&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

36. A Walk to Remember (2002)

Yet another Nicholas Sparks novel that inspires the theaters. When Landon plays pranks with a boy and gets into trouble, he is sent to participate in community services. The punishment becomes a place to explore his love and fate when Jamie, the reverend’s daughter, joins him.

Will poles apart Landon and Jamie come together?

Director: Adam Shankman

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama

Main Cast:

Mandy Moore

Shane West

Peter Coyote

Daryl Hannah

IMDB Rating: 7.3

Box Office: $47,494,916

Run Time: 1 hour 41 minutes

Movie Trailer: A Walk to Remember (2002)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Walk-Remember-Shane-West/dp/B008Q00LLE/ref=sr_1_1?crid=DDQJ1Y4B7XA2&keywords=A+Walk+to+Remember+%282002%29&qid=1659337052&s=instant-video&sprefix=a+walk+to+remember+2002+%2Cinstant-video%2C328&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

37. Serendipity (2001)

After the evening they first met, the couple explores each other’s years of falling in love and getting parted, compromising that they would come together someday.

Director: Peter Chelsom

Language: English, French

Genre: Romance, Comedy

Main Cast:

John Cusack

Kate Beckinsale

Jeremy Piven

Bridget Moynahan

IMDB Rating: 6.8

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Serendipity-John-Cusack/dp/B00CAKCS9O/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3GLWW09NHTNHW&keywords=Serendipity+%282001%29&qid=1659337421&s=instant-video&sprefix=serendipity+2001+%2Cinstant-video%2C757&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

38. Notting Hill (1999)

Love doesn’t knock on doors; instead, it pumps the heart. An ordinary bookshop merchant’s life changes when he encounters the world’s most famous movie star.

Director: Roger Michell

Language: English, Spanish, French

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Julia Roberts

Hugh Grant

Richard Mccabe

Rhys Ifans

IMDB Rating: 7.2

Box Office: $363,889,678

Run Time: 2 hours 4 minutes

Movie Trailer: Notting Hill Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Notting-Hill-Julia-Roberts/dp/B000I9WWCM/ref=sr_1_2?crid=1JOC5NPRNED6Z&keywords=Notting+Hill+%281999%29&qid=1659338426&s=instant-video&sprefix=notting+hill+1999+%2Cinstant-video%2C838&sr=1-2″ watchon=”Amazon”]

39. 10 Things I Hate About You (1999)

The movie is an adaptation of Shakespeare’s play The Taming of the Shrew. An adorable and famous teen cannot think of her date until her bad-tempered elder sister decides to go on one.

Director: Gil Junger

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Heath Ledger

Julia Stiles

Joseph Gordon-Levitt

Larisa Oleynik

IMDB Rating: 7.3

Box Office: $53,478,579

Run Time: 1 hour 37 minutes

Movie Trailer: 10 Things I Hate About You 1999

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/10-Things-Hate-About-You/dp/B0063T7JGU/ref=sr_1_1?crid=2TQ5SJTQIDQOU&keywords=10+Things+I+Hate+About+You+%281999%29&qid=1659338558&s=instant-video&sprefix=10+things+i+hate+about+you+1999+%2Cinstant-video%2C320&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

40. You’ve Got Mail (1998)

Kathleen Kelly, an autonomous bookstore owner, and Joe Fox, the well-established tycoon of a book superstore, fall in love through Internet’s anonymity. Both are unaware that Fox targets Kelly’s store to shut down for his business needs.

Director: Nora Ephron

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Tom hanks

Meg Ryan

Greg Kinnear

Parker Posey

IMDB Rating: 6.7

Box Office: $250,821,495

Run Time: 1 hour 59 minutes

Movie Trailer: You’ve Got Mail (1998) – Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Youve-Got-Mail-Tom-Hanks/dp/B001N3LLIS/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1G78718MI0UYZ&keywords=You%E2%80%99ve+Got+Mail+%281998%29&qid=1659338840&s=instant-video&sprefix=you+ve+got+mail+1998+%2Cinstant-video%2C810&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

41. William Shakespeare’s Romeo + Juliet (1996)

Shakespeare’s classic drama is adapted to the modern times of Verona, keeping its evergreen conversations from the text.

Director: Baz Luhrmann

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama

Main Cast:

Leonardo DiCaprio

Claire Danes

John Leguizamo

Harold Perrineau

IMDB Rating: 6.7

Box Office: $147,554,998

Run Time: 2 hours

Movie Trailer: Romeo and Juliet 1996

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Romeo-Juliet-Leonardo-DiCaprio/dp/B000I9X7M6/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1YL4HUNQCA8K5&keywords=William+Shakespeare%E2%80%99s+Romeo+%2B+Juliet+%281996%29&qid=1659339130&s=instant-video&sprefix=william+shakespeare+s+romeo+%2B+juliet+1996+%2Cinstant-video%2C313&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

42. Sleepless in Seattle (1993)

Losing your partner doesn’t mean the be-all and end-all of married life. So, the movie shows a widowed man’s son who participates in a radio talk show to find the perfect person for his father.

Director: Nora Ephron

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Drama, Comedy

Main Cast:

Tom Hanks

Meg Ryan

Ross Malinger

Rita Wilson

IMDB Rating: 6.8

Box Office: $227,927,165

Run Time: 1 hour 45 minutes

Movie Trailer: Sleepless in Seattle (1993)

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Sleepless-Seattle-Meg-Ryan/dp/B008Y7GQ72/ref=sr_1_1?crid=22J77SP96833P&keywords=Sleepless+in+Seattle+%281993%29&qid=1659339223&s=instant-video&sprefix=sleepless+in+seattle+1993+%2Cinstant-video%2C320&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

Other Romantic Movies

1. Marry Me (2022)

Marry Me is a romantic movie that celebrates music. It discusses the story of music superstar Kat Valdez who is getting married to Bastian, another music superstar, after their big hit of the album “Marry Me,” in the audience’s presence. Still, seconds before her vows, she learns that Bastin has betrayed her. Kate instead decides to marry Charlie, a random stranger from the crowd. The movie leaves the audience with a strange question: can two people from different world pair with each other and lead a happy life?

Director: Kat Coiro

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Music

Main Cast:

Jennifer Lopez

Owen Wilson

Maluma

IMDB Rating: 6.1

Box Office: $50,525,169

Run Time: 1 hour 52 minutes

Movie Trailer: Marry Me – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Marry-Me-Jennifer-Lopez/dp/B09KDLMYT1/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=marry+me&qid=1658825165&s=instant-video&sprefix=Marry+me%2Cinstant-video%2C449&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

2. Redeeming Love (2022)

Redeeming Love is a beautiful love story based on Francine River’s bestselling novel – Redeeming Love. It talks of a young couple’s relationship against the bitter realities of the California Gold Rush, 1850. Angel, a young girl, experiences love for the first time, but due to some inevitable circumstances, she escapes from her new life, thinking she doesn’t deserve it until she meets Michael, who finds her out. Only then does Angel feel the independence to choose the life she wishes. Director: D J Caruso

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Abigail Cowen

Tom Levis

Eric Dane

IMDB Rating: 6.6

Box Office: $9,464,198

Run Time: 2 hours 14 minutes

Movie Trailer: Redeeming Love – Movie Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Redeeming-Love-Abigail-Cowen/dp/B09PQFVMCG/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=redeeming+love&qid=1658825123&s=instant-video&sprefix=Rede%2Cinstant-video%2C379&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

3. 365 Days (2020)

365 Days discusses two people Massimo, a member of the Sicilian Mafia family, and Laura, a sales director. Laura is successful in her career but lacks passion in her private life. She takes one last chance to save her relationship by going on a trip with Martin to Sicily. Massimo kidnaps Laura and gives her a period of 365 days to fall in love with him.

Director: Barbara Bialowas, Tomasz Mandes

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Anna-Maria Sieklucka

Michele Morrone

Bronislaw Wroclawski

IMDB Rating: 3.3

Box Office: $9,458,590

Run Time: 1 hour 54 minutes

Movie Trailer: 365 Days – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81245964″ watchon=”Netflix”]

4. After (2019)

A major Motion Picture, After, is based on Anna Todd’s novel, “After.” It throws light on

a young woman, Tessa, who falls in love with a dark, mysterious guy, Hardin Scott. Tessa,

otherwise a dedicated student and an obedient daughter with grand futuristic ambitions

are now made to question herself and her life by this mysterious guy.

Director: Jenny Gage

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy

Main Cast:

Josephine Langford

Hero Fiennes Tiffin

Khadijha Red Thunder

IMDB Rating: 5.2

Box Office: $69,518,232

Run Time: 1 hour 45 minutes

Movie Trailer: After – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/After-Josephine-Langford/dp/B07QHRR3HC/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1W1H1CT6IQRH0&keywords=After&qid=1658825020&s=instant-video&sprefix=afte%2Cinstant-video%2C368&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

5. Little Women (2019)

Years after the Civil War, Jo March, a writer, makes her living in New York City while Amy March, her sister, studies painting in Paris. Jo oscillates in her life, narrating the story of the March sisters. Amy accidentally meets Theodore Laurence, her childhood love, who proposed to Jo but was ultimately rejected. Finally, the shy sister Beth March’s devastating illness brings the family together.

Director: Greta Gerwig

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Saoirse Ronan

Emma Watson

Florence Pugh

IMDB Rating: 7.8

Box Office: $216,601,214

Run Time: 2 hours 15 minutes

Movie Trailer: Little Women – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Little-Women-Emma-Watson/dp/B082WM1BG9/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=little+women&qid=1658824976&s=instant-video&sprefix=Little+%2Cinstant-video%2C636&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

6. Crazy Rich Asians (2018)

Crazy Rich Asians is a contemporary rom-com that discusses Rachel Chu, who travels with her boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend’s wedding in Singapore. Surprisingly, she learns Nick’s family is wealthy, with him considered one of the nation’s most eligible bachelors.

Director: John M Chu

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama

Main Cast:

Constance Wu

Henry Golding

Michelle Yeoh

IMDB Rating: 6.9

Box Office: $238,843,729

Run Time: 2 hours

Movie Trailer: Crazy Rich Asians – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Crazy-Rich-Asians-Constance-Wu/dp/B07JWGJ49W/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=crazy+rich+asians&qid=1658824942&s=instant-video&sprefix=Craz%2Cinstant-video%2C371&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

7. Fifty Shades of Grey (2015)

Anastasia Steele, an English literature graduate of Washington State University, takes up an interview session with billionaire Christian Grey for the college newspaper as a favor to her friend Kate Kavanagh. The interview leads to Grey showing interest in Anastasia. They start dating, and in the course of their relationship, she discovers Grey’s past and learns that he is unsuitable for any woman.

Director: Sam Taylor-Johnson

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Thriller

Main Cast:

Dakota Johnson

Jamie Dornan

Jennifer Ehle

IMDB Rating: 4.1

Box Office: $569,651,467

Run Time: 2 hours 5 minutes

Movie Trailer: Fifty Shades of Grey – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Fifty-Shades-Unrated-Dakota-Johnson/dp/B00VGRDDUK/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=fifty+shades+of+grey&qid=1658824829&s=instant-video&sprefix=Fifty+%2Cinstant-video%2C1015&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

8. Focus (2015)

Nicky Spurgeon is a well-accomplished con man, who ropes in Jess, an amateur con artist under his wing. Nicky and Jess get closer romantically, and they split only to run into each other after three years.

Director: Glenn Ficarra, John Reque

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy, Crime, Drama

Main Cast:

Will Smith

Margot Robbie

Rodrigo Santoro

IMDB Rating: 6.6

Box Office: $158,762,963

Run Time: 1 hour 45 minutes

Movie Trailer: Focus – Official Trailer

[Jwatchnow link=”https://www.amazon.com/Focus-Will-Smith/dp/B00YORD3PY/ref=sr_1_1?crid=MAFNV3OI72Y9&keywords=Focus&qid=1658824798&s=instant-video&sprefix=focu%2Cinstant-video%2C370&sr=1-1″ watchon=”Amazon”]

9. The Best of Me (2014)

To pay homage to their friend, Amanda and Dawson return to their tiny hometown and meet after 20 years. But, unfortunately, they share a bitter past where circumstances forced them to break up their love years before.

Director: Michael Hoffman

Language: English

Genre: Romance, Comedy

Main Cast:

James Marsden

Michelle Monaghan

Luke Bracey

Liana Liberato

IMDB Rating: 6.6

Box Office: $38,609,668

Run Time: 1 hour 58 minutes

Movie Trailer: The Best Of Me
